slide.title: Abstract classes
slide.blurb: In PHP 5 classes can also be defined as "abstract" classes, which must be extended before it can be instanciated
slide.example:
<?php
	abstract class foobar {

		abstract function myfunct();

	}

	class myfoobar extends foobar {

		function myfunct() { /* .... */ }
	}

	$a = new myfoobar;
	$a->myfunct();
?>
